item.description:
This new version of the WARS series has been completely revamped to take place in a fantasy world. The battles are set to occur on the lost continent of Gamora, where players' armies will have to face a new adversaries and conquer rich territories.

In this game release you will find, in addition to a new and full-color graphical layout:

3x Armies (The Sylvanids, the Knights of the Silver Marches and the ancient Eternals)
100x Detachments Bases (representing all the army units)
45x Battle cards
27x Army specific Strategic Cards
24x Base Strategy cards
80x Counters
10x Scenic elements

With WARS Fantasy, players will now experience an added layer of strategic unpredictability through the use of Battle Cards, which has been added to the classic Alternate Command Activation system. They players will still have the option of choosing Strategy Cards, which have made the WARS system popular amongst three-dimensional battle games enthusiasts.

Despite the changes, the game still maintains its ease of play and quick duration, which lasts around 60-90 minutes. Additionally, its compact size, only requiring a table of 80x100 cm, makes it one of the most convenient options for organizing tournaments or events.

In summary, WARS Fantasy is not only simple to learn but also an engaging game that provides a thrilling experience for all players. The game's updated elements have breathed new life into it, making it an excellent choice for those looking for a fresh, exciting battle game.

—description from the designer
